text: Soni pangali chiumbe chilichose chakuulukutaga petaka ikaweje lisiki lyakwe lili kwa Allah, nijukumanyilila liuto lyakwe lyakutamilichika (mun’gongo mwaatatigwe kapena pa duniya) kwisa soni malo gakuchisunjila (m’chitumbo chaachikulugwe kapena m’malembe), yosope ili m’chitabu chakusalichisya (chilichose Al-Lauh-Al-Mahfuz)
